channel.title: Editing your server?
channel.description:
Hi I am new to this and I have the MoparScape downloaded. I played it a few I understand the ::pickup ::npc ::pnpc ect....
But this is my first topic here.
So How do I edit my server?
Like make my own commands, make my own npcs, characters, items, fighting styles, land,levels,places,houses,updating,ect....
I understand servers and clients (of course im not that much of a noob lol)....
And I understand a Little bit of javascript.
Is there a easy way to make my own server and edit things and place things like that...
Also the ::npc command when I summon a monster or person ect... They die in 1 hit... lol even if it says 0 dmg.... And their body screws up lol...
Also a few more things,
How can I make it to were you create an account on my server and your character starts as LV 3 with 0 exp in all? Like in Real RS?
And How can I make it to were your magic works & to were the ::npc add thing acually makes the monsters move and have the right ammount of hp and not die in 1 hit, and change what they drop?
That would be nice to know thanks!!!
[glow=red,2,300]Also sorry If I broke the rules cause Im new.[/glow]

item.title: Editing your server?
item.dc:creator: @zombie13333 zombie13333
item.description:
@zombie13333 wrote:

oh lol No wonder… lol I guess I guess I need to learn another code lol…

I already know:

C
dll.
Javascript

lol

Now another one I need to learn Java. Lol that one sounds fun…

HELP:
On the setup for making a port.

It says access your router and add a port on the gaming tab… ???/

How do I access my router???

Read full topic

item.title: Editing your server?
item.dc:creator: @thejurm1 thejurm1
item.description:
@thejurm1 wrote:

hey zombie, all of the tutorials can help you, click on ==Tutorial List== to find the different ones that are good. And javascript is for web coding, not for java clients

Read full topic
